questions.question: In which month of the Islamic calendar does Ramadan occur?
questions.explanation: Ramadan is the ninth month of the Islamic lunar calendar.

questions.question: What is the primary act of worship during Ramadan?
questions.explanation: Fasting from dawn to sunset is the central act of worship during Ramadan.
